title: Techniques
creator_credit: Center for Humanities and Eve Cotton
brief_description: By analysing and comparing great paintings from different periods, this series provides a unique introduction to art. This program examines the techniques used to produce different styles of painting. The techniques examined are: fresco, tempera and oil, water colour, pastel and prints.
